name: Fancy Dice Roll Simulator
description:
This game was made for GMTK jam and to have fun during the weekend

its definitely a game , that u might enjoy :3

Special thanks to the Sketchfab community , too lazy to remember the names so just search for : DICE and you will find the awesome artists who made 90% of the level

and to Unigine Engine for being a brain f**k epic cool engine 

if you didnt enjoy the game ... perhabs pay some to make it better (hehe) :0
